item.title: About
item.description: David Scrobonia is a Security Engineer at Segment working to secure modern web apps and AWS infrastructure. He graduated from Cal Poly SLO with a BS/MS in Computer Engineering/Computer Science where he contributed to the AppSensor project for his thesis. David contributes to open source in his spare time and is a core team member of the OWASP ZAP project where he helped develop the Heads Up Display.
